comments_en.github_username: GitHub username, set to 0 to use workflow account, or specify username
comments_en.github_token_env: Environment variable name for GitHub access token, this value is a secret in GitHub Action
comments_en.openrouter_api_key_env: Environment variable name for OpenRouter API key, this value is a secret in GitHub Action
comments_en.default_copilot_model: Default Copilot API model, can be changed based on the models supported by the API provider
comments_en.default_openrouter_model: Default OpenRouter model, can be changed based on the models supported by OpenRouter
comments_en.max_workers: Maximum number of concurrent worker threads, integer, recommended 1-5
comments_en.rate_limit_delay: Rate limit delay time (seconds), integer, recommended 10-60
comments_en.request_retry_delay: Request retry delay time (seconds), integer, recommended 20-120
comments_en.readme_sum_path: Output file path, relative path or absolute path

comments_cn.language: 输出语言，可选值: 'zh' (中文), 'en' (英文)
comments_cn.model_choice: 模型选择，可选值: 'copilot' 或 'openrouter'
comments_cn.github_username: GitHub用户名，设置为0时自动使用workflow账号，或填写指定用户名
comments_cn.github_token_env: GitHub访问令牌的环境变量名，该值为GitHub Action的secret
comments_cn.openrouter_api_key_env: OpenRouter API密钥的环境变量名，该值为GitHub Action的secret
comments_cn.default_copilot_model: Copilot API默认模型，可根据API提供商支持的模型列表更改
comments_cn.default_openrouter_model: OpenRouter默认模型，可根据OpenRouter支持的模型列表更改
comments_cn.max_workers: 最大并发工作线程数，整数，建议1-5
comments_cn.request_timeout: 请求超时时间(秒)，整数，建议30-120
comments_cn.rate_limit_delay: 速率限制延迟时间(秒)，整数，建议10-60
comments_cn.request_retry_delay: 请求重试延迟时间(秒)，整数，建议20-120
comments_cn.retry_attempts: 最大重试次数，整数，建议1-5
comments_cn.readme_sum_path: 输出文件路径，相对路径或绝对路径
